description.narrative: he organization Femmes et Droits Humains (Women and Human Rights - FDH) is a non-political, not-for-profit organization which worksfor the defense and promotion of women#s and girls# human rights, particularly those related to political participation, sexual andreproductive health and rights, the right to education and economic empowerment. The present Project named My voice for social change will be implemented for 18 months and target young girl citizen engagement. The global objective contributeto young girl leadership and confidence development able to influence local decisions - markers in favor of women rights in the communities facilitate the relationship and synergy between young girl and women right defenders. implement virtualplatform between girl and communties to exchange and learnand etablish a secure space to share and to discuss about their sexuality and others GVB issues. during 24 months the projetct targets to Develop a pool of young women and girl leaders tocreate and occupy spaces for social change, influence policies/decisions in favor of women's rights by Connecting the senior coaches with other young women and girl leaders, virtual platform animation for monitoring and exchange between youngs and femmesleaders models. mains activities are ; training and others budling capaciites activities includes exchange, mentorat and coaching inclusive approches includes vidoaos and audio production and website also. Online and offline activities focused onpublicaion, doculmentation and sharing. the project will be implenented in Kati and Bamako.

participating-org.narrative:
The organization Femmes et Droits Humains (Women and Human Rights - FDH) is a non-political, not-for-profit organization which works for the defense and promotion of women#s and girls# human rights, particularly those related to political participation, sexual and reproductive health and rights, the right to education and economic empowerment. These rights are crucially important in the expression of equity for women, and to promote development, good governance, social justice and sustainable developmentin general. HenceFDH works to influence and support all laws, strategies, actions for the promotion and defense of women and girls# human rights. FDH actively supports, facilitates and empowers women and girls, and the public in general, building fromthe grassroots, to become effective partners who influence policy development and consolidate social justice, gender equality and democracy.
Vision: FDH#s vision is of community and society that promote the economic, social, civil and political rights of women and girls in particular, and of the public in general, for the attainment of social justice and sustainable development.
Mission: FDH#s mission is to support, facilitate women and girls, social, economic and political empowerment and peopleatthe grassroots to become effective partners able toinfluence policies development for the consolidation of social justice, gender equality and democracy.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
